desc.en: This extension provides you a way to publish color highlighted programming code via Javascript. Just pick the new content element and it will automatically highlight the content. (You should use HTML content element) Supports following languages (auto detect): * AVR Assembler * Apache * Bash * C# * C++ * CSS * Delphi * HTML/XML * Java * Javascript * PHP * Perl * Python * Ruby * SQL * VBscript Uses Highlight.js from Программы Software Maniacs.
